00007 #include <Wt/WServer>
00008 
00009 #include "BlogRSSFeed.h"
00010 #include "WtHome.h"
00011 #include "JWtHome.h"
00012 
00013 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00014 {
00015   WServer server(argv[0]);
00016 
00017   server.setServerConfiguration(argc, argv, WTHTTP_CONFIGURATION);
00018 
00019   BlogRSSFeed rssFeed("blog.db", "Wt and JWt blog",
00020                       "http://www.webtoolkit.eu/wt/blog",
00021                       "We care about our webtoolkits.");
00022 
00023   server.addResource(&rssFeed, "/wt/blog/feed/");
00024 
00025   server.addEntryPoint(Application, createWtHomeApplication,
00026                        "", "/css/wt/favicon.ico");
00027   server.addEntryPoint(Application, createJWtHomeApplication,
00028                        "/jwt", "/css/jwt/favicon.ico");
00029 
00030   if (server.start()) {
00031     WServer::waitForShutdown();
00032     server.stop();
00033   }
00034 }
